grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 触発【ショクハツ】detonation by contact, contact detonation, touching off (something), triggering, sparking, provocation, inspiration
鎧袖一触【ガイシュウイッショク】(beating someone) hands down, with a single blow
言語接触【ゲンゴセッショク】language contact
kun reading compounds: 触れる【ふれる】to touch, to feel, to experience, to come in contact with, to perceive, to touch on (a subject), to allude to, to refer to, to mention, to be in conflict with, to violate (law, copyright, etc.), to infringe, to proclaim, to make known, to spread (e.g. a rumour)
触る【さわる】to touch, to feel
触る【さわる】to touch, to feel
触らぬ神に祟りなし【さわらぬかみにたたりなし】let sleeping dogs lie, if it ain't broke, don't fix it
